artist: Artist: Julie Buffalohead; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Lithograph and screenprint on two sheets of paper. Right panel is bleed printed from three plates in blue, light pink, and dark pink depicting a coyote in a tutu. Left panel is bleed printed from one plate in blue and screenprinted from one screen in black and satin gloss depicting a rabbit in a skirt with a wand.

markings: LLC of L sheet in pencil: ARCH 1/2 | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LLC of L sheet: HP
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC of R sheet in pencil: Julie Buffalohead 2015 | LL of R sheet in pencil: THE TRICKSTER SHOWDOWN
title: The Trickster Showdown
